title: LaTeX 作業模板

content: 好欸， Paddy HQ 正式上線啦 🥳🥳 這裡之後會放我的日常，比如修課紀錄以及一些活動的心得等等，敬請期待～
title: First Post

content: Hi there! I’m Paddy Yu-Syuan Lee, a 🇹🇼 Taiwanese junior majoring in Computer Science. Welcome to my portfolio website! I’m currently serving as the 48th President of the NTU CSIE Council and the Director of the Information Department at Topedia International Education Co., Ltd. I also worked as the Teaching Assistant for Data Structures and Algorithms. I enjoy connecting with people from diverse backgrounds, exchanging experiences, and sharing perspectives with others. Looking forward to meeting you!
title: About Me

content: Education B.S. in Computer Science & Information Engineering, National Taiwan University (Expected: June 2027)
title: About Me

content: Experience Student President, NTU CSIE Council, 2025.08 - Present Director, Department of Information, Topedia International Education Co., Ltd., 2025.09 - Present Lecturer, Taipei Fuhsing Private School, 2025.09 - Present Lecturer, Kang Chiao International School, Xiugang Campus, 2024.09 - Present Vice Student President, NTU CSIE Council, 2024.08 - 2025.07 General Coordinator, 2025 NTU CSIE Night, 2024.09 - 2025.08 Teaching Assistant, Data Structures and Algorithms, 2025.02 - 2025.06
